price: (14) And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow [i.e., stroke] -
arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waḥumilati al-arḍu wal-jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidatan
